name: Robbins, Appellant, v. E. R. Crown Construction Co.
name_abbreviation: Robbins v. E. R. Crown Construction Co.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Bok, JJ.
parties: Robbins, Appellant, v. E. R. Crown Construction Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The opinion of Judge Flood fully justifies the order making absolute the defendants’ rule on the plaintiff to show cause wliy tbe judgment entered at the specified number and term in the court below should not be satisfied.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Philip Shuchman, with him Simon Lenson, and Len-son é Yusem, for appellant.
Samuel B. Brenner, with him Brenner & Brenn&r, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Robbins, Appellant, v. E. R. Crown Construction Co.
January 5, 1959:
Argued November 17, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Bok, JJ.
Philip Shuchman, with him Simon Lenson, and Len-son é Yusem, for appellant.
Samuel B. Brenner, with him Brenner & Brenn&r, for appellees.
